author: parithosh
content:
The pinned kurtosis config has been updated with reth as well! 
Hive status for bugs that need fixing: https://hive.pectra-devnet-5.ethpandaops.io/ (wait a bit so the new fixtures get to be tested)

author: pawandhananjay
content: is there an assertoor config for sending deposits/withdrawals/consolidations? want to test the engine api changes

author: parithosh
content:
You can use these tests: https://github.com/ethpandaops/assertoor/tree/master/playbooks/pectra-dev

cc <@808969530608451584> in case he wrote a specific one to test this

author: pk910
content:
```yaml
additional_services:
  - assertoor
assertoor_params:
  image: "ethpandaops/assertoor:master"
  tests:
    - file: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ethpandaops/assertoor/refs/heads/master/playbooks/pectra-dev/kurtosis/all.yaml
```
this should trigger all these operations:
deposit at slot 38
el triggered exit at slot 50
self consolidation/0x02 cred change at slot 54
and full consolidation at slot 58

author: pk910
content: looks like besu pairs stop proposing blocks at slot 38 (after the deposits)

author: pawandhananjay
content: this is helpful, thank you! is there another config that does all the executionRequests in the same slot?
